ygData.subject: Re: Level 4 and 8 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: If I remember right, Cavorting Bones was the first level pet summoning, and Leering Corps was the 4th. Definately get Poisen Bolt ~Mysk ... From: Andy
ygData.messageBody:
If I remember right, Cavorting Bones was the first level pet summoning,
and Leering Corps was the 4th.

Definately get Poisen Bolt

~Mysk

----- Original Message -----
From: Andy <skimaster@...>
To: <eq_necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 8:50 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Level 4 and 8 spells


> From: Andy <skimaster@...>
>
> Right now, I am a level 5 Necromancer. I have bought Cavorting Bones(I
think that is the name of the level 4 pet spell), Clinging Darkness, and
Lifespike. Are tehre any other spells I should buy at this level. I am not
going to buy Gate until level 8, because I will not be travelling far until
level 8(when I get Gather Shadows). At level 8, what spells should I buy?
Right now, I am thinking Gather Shadows -> Pet -> Gate -> Ward Undead. Are
there any other spells I should buy at this level? And should I change this
order?
>
>
>
> Leanne, level 5 Gnomish Necromancer
>
